scripts.build:nunjucks: mkdir -p dist/pages && cd src/pages && find . -name '*.njk' -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p ../../dist/pages/$(dirname {}) && cp {} ../../dist/pages/{}' \;
scripts.build:routes: mkdir -p dist/routes && cd src && find routes -name '*.ts' ! -name '*.test.ts' ! -name '*.spec.ts' -type f -exec sh -c 'mkdir -p ../dist/$(dirname {}) && cp {} ../dist/{}' \; 2>/dev/null || true
